Catalysts: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds

aquilafavonia.name: Aquila Favonia
aquilafavonia.r1: ATK is increased by 20%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100% of ATK and dealing 200% of ATK as DMG to surrounding enemies. This effect can only occur once every 15s.
aquilafavonia.r2: ATK is increased by 25%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 115% of ATK and dealing 230% of ATK as DMG to surrounding enemies. This effect can only occur once every 15s.
aquilafavonia.r3: ATK is increased by 30%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 130% of ATK and dealing 260% of ATK as DMG to surrounding enemies. This effect can only occur once every 15s.
aquilafavonia.r4: ATK is increased by 35%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 145% of ATK and dealing 290% of ATK as DMG to surrounding enemies. This effect can only occur once every 15s.
aquilafavonia.r5: ATK is increased by 40%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 160% of ATK and dealing 320% of ATK as DMG to surrounding enemies. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

blackclifflongsword.name: Blackcliff Longsword
blackclifflongsword.r1: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackclifflongsword.r2: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 15% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackclifflongsword.r3: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 18% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackclifflongsword.r4: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 21% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackclifflongsword.r5: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

coolsteel.name: Cool Steel
coolsteel.r1: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12%.
coolsteel.r2: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 15%.
coolsteel.r3: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 18%.
coolsteel.r4: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 21%.
coolsteel.r5: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 24%.

darkironsword.name: Dark Iron Sword
darkironsword.r1: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 20% for 12s.
darkironsword.r2: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 25% for 12s.
darkironsword.r3: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 30% for 12s.
darkironsword.r4: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 35% for 12s.
darkironsword.r5: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 40% for 12s.

favoniussword.name: Favonius Sword
favoniussword.r1: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character

filletblade.name: Fillet Blade
filletblade.r1: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 240% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 15s.
filletblade.r2: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 280% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 14s.
filletblade.r3: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 320% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 13s.
filletblade.r4: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 360% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 12s.
filletblade.r5: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 400% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 11s.

harbingerofdawn.name: Harbinger of Dawn
harbingerofdawn.r1: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14%
harbingerofdawn.r2: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 17.5%.
harbingerofdawn.r3: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 21%.
harbingerofdawn.r4: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 24.5%.
harbingerofdawn.r5: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 28%.

ironsting.name: Iron Sting
ironsting.r1: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 8% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
ironsting.r2: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 10% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
ironsting.r3: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
ironsting.r4: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 14% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
ironsting.r5: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 16% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.

lionsroar.name: Lions Roar
lionsroar.r1: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 20%.
lionsroar.r2: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 25%.
lionsroar.r3: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 30%.
lionsroar.r4: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 35%.
lionsroar.r5: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 40%.

prototyperancour.name: Prototype Rancour
prototyperancour.r1: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
prototyperancour.r2: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 7.5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
prototyperancour.r3: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 9% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
prototyperancour.r4: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 10.5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
prototyperancour.r5: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 12% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

royallongsword.name: Royal Longsword
royallongsword.r1: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 6%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

sacrificialsword.name: Sacrificial Sword
sacrificialsword.r1: Taking damage generates a shield which absorbs damage up to 16% of Max HP for 10s. Can only occur once every 45s.
sacrificialsword.r2: Taking damage generates a shield which absorbs damage up to ?% of Max HP for ?s. Can only occur once every 45s.

skyridersword.name: Skyrider Sword
skyridersword.r1: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 12s.
skyridersword.r2: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 15% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 12s.
skyridersword.r3: Using an Elemental Burst grants an 18% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 12s.
skyridersword.r4: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 21% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 12s.
skyridersword.r5: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 24% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 12s.

skywardblade.name: Skyward Blade
skywardblade.r1: Increases incoming healing by 20%, CRIT Rate by 4% and gives an 80% chance to generate an Elemental Particle. Can only occur once every 9s.

thealleyflash.name: The Alley Flash
thealleyflash.r1: Continuosly sprinting for at least 1s increases ATK by 28% for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

theblacksword.name: The Black Sword
theblacksword.r1: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 16%. Additionally, regenerates 60% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

theflute.name: The Flute
theflute.r1: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to gain a harmonic. 5 harmonics trigger the power of music, which deals 200% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s.
theflute.r2: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to gain a harmonic. 5 harmonics trigger the power of music, which deals 250% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s.
theflute.r3: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to gain a harmonic. 5 harmonics trigger the power of music, which deals 300% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s.
theflute.r4: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to gain a harmonic. 5 harmonics trigger the power of music, which deals 350% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s.
theflute.r5: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to gain a harmonic. 5 harmonics trigger the power of music, which deals 400% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s.

travelershandysword.name: Travelers Handy Sword
travelershandysword.r1: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1% HP.
travelershandysword.r2: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1.25% HP.
travelershandysword.r3: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1.50% HP.
travelershandysword.r4: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1.75% HP.
travelershandysword.r5: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 2% HP.

alleyhunter.name: Alley Hunter
alleyhunter.r1: Every 4s a character is on the field, their ATK increases by 4% and their CRIT DMG increases by 4%. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be cleared when the character takes DMG.
alleyhunter.r2: Every 4s a character is on the field, their ATK increases by 5% and their CRIT DMG increases by 5%. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be cleared when the character takes DMG.
alleyhunter.r3: Every 4s a character is on the field, their ATK increases by 6% and their CRIT DMG increases by 6%. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be cleared when the character takes DMG.
alleyhunter.r4: Every 4s a character is on the field, their ATK increases by 7% and their CRIT DMG increases by 7%. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be cleared when the character takes DMG.
alleyhunter.r5: Every 4s a character is on the field, their ATK increases by 8% and their CRIT DMG increases by 8%. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be cleared when the character takes DMG.

amosbow.name: Amos Bow
amosbow.r1: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 12%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 8% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.
amosbow.r2: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 15%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 10% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.
amosbow.r3: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 18%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 12% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.
amosbow.r4: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 21%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 14% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.
amosbow.r5: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 24%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 16% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.

blackcliffwarbow.name: Blackcliff Warbow
blackcliffwarbow.r1: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffwarbow.r2: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 15% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffwarbow.r3: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 18% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffwarbow.r4: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 21% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffwarbow.r5: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

compoundbow.name: Compound Bow
compoundbow.r1: Normal Attack and Aimed Shot hits increase ATK by 6% and Normal Attack SPD by 1.2% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
compoundbow.r2: Normal Attack and Aimed Shot hits increase ATK by 7.5% and Normal Attack SPD by 1.5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
compoundbow.r3: Normal Attack and Aimed Shot hits increase ATK by 9% and Normal Attack SPD by 1.8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
compoundbow.r4: Normal Attack and Aimed Shot hits increase ATK by 10.5% and Normal Attack SPD by 2.1% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
compoundbow.r5: Normal Attack and Aimed Shot hits increase ATK by 12% and Normal Attack SPD by 2.4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

ebonybow.name: Ebony Bow
ebonybow.r1: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin enemies by 40%.
ebonybow.r2: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin enemies by 50%.
ebonybow.r3: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin enemies by 60%.
ebonybow.r4: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin enemies by 70%.
ebonybow.r5: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin enemies by 80%.

favoniuswarbow.name: Favonius Warbow
favoniuswarbow.r1: CRIT hits have a 60% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.
favoniuswarbow.r2: CRIT hits have a 70% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 10.5s.
favoniuswarbow.r3: CRIT hits have an 80% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 9s.
favoniuswarbow.r4: CRIT hits have a 90% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 7.5s.
favoniuswarbow.r5: CRIT hits have a 100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 6s.

messenger.name: Messenger
messenger.r1: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 100% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
messenger.r2: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 125% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
messenger.r3: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 150% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
messenger.r4: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 175% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
messenger.r5: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 200% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

prototypecrescent.name: Prototype Crescent
prototypecrescent.r1: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 36% for 10s.

ravenbow.name: Raven Bow
ravenbow.r1: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 12%.
ravenbow.r2: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 15%.
ravenbow.r3: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 18%.
ravenbow.r4: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 21%.
ravenbow.r5: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 24%.

royalbow.name: Royal Bow
royalbow.r1: Increases Aimed Shot DMG by 100%. Can only occur once every 10s.

rust.name: Rust
rust.r1: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 40% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 8%
rust.r2: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 50% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 9%
rust.r3: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 60% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 10%
rust.r4: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 70% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 11%
rust.r5: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 80% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 12%

sacrificialbow.name: Sacrificial Bow
sacrificialbow.r1: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 15s.
sacrificialbow.r2: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 50% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 15s.
sacrificialbow.r3: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 60% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 15s.
sacrificialbow.r4: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 70% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 15s.
sacrificialbow.r5: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has an 80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 11s.

sharpshootersoath.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
sharpshootersoath.r1: Increases DMG against weak spots by 24%.
sharpshootersoath.r2: Increases DMG against weak spots by 30%.
sharpshootersoath.r3: Increases DMG against weak spots by 36%.
sharpshootersoath.r4: Increases DMG against weak spots by 42%.
sharpshootersoath.r5: Increases DMG against weak spots by 48%.

skywardharp.name: Skyward Harp
skywardharp.r1: Increases CRIT DMG by 20%. Hits have a 60% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 100% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 4s.
skywardharp.r2: Increases CRIT DMG by 25%. Hits have a 70% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 100% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 3.5s.
skywardharp.r3: Increases CRIT DMG by 30%. Hits have an 80% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 100% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 3s.
skywardharp.r4: Increases CRIT DMG by 35%. Hits have a 90% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 100% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 2.5s.
skywardharp.r5: Increases CRIT DMG by 40%. Hits have a 100% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 100% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 4s.

slingshot.name: Slingshot
slingshot.r1: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 36%; otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.
slingshot.r2: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 42%; otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.
slingshot.r3: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 48%; otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.
slingshot.r4: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 54%; otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.
slingshot.r5: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 60%; otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.

thestringless.name: The Stringless
thestringless.r1: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 24%.
thestringless.r2: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 30%.
thestringless.r3: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 36%.
thestringless.r4: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 42%.
thestringless.r5: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 48%

theviridescenthunt.name: The Viridescent Hunt
theviridescenthunt.r1: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding enemies, dealing 24% of ATK as DMG to these enemies every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 16s.

blackcliffpole.name: Blackcliff Pole
blackcliffpole.r1: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffpole.r2: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 15% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffpole.r3: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 18% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffpole.r4: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 21% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffpole.r5: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

crescentpike.name: Crescent Pike
crescentpike.r1: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 24% ATK as DMG for 5s.
crescentpike.r2: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 30% ATK as DMG for 5s.
crescentpike.r3: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 36% ATK as DMG for 5s.
crescentpike.r4: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 42% ATK as DMG for 5s.
crescentpike.r5: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 48% ATK as DMG for 5s.

deathmatch.name: Deathmatch
deathmatch.r1: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 12% and DEF is increased by 12%. If there are less than 2 enemies nearby, ATK is increased by 24%.

dragonsbane.name: Dragon's Bane
dragonsbane.r1: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 20%.
dragonsbane.r2: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 24%.
dragonsbane.r3: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 28%.
dragonsbane.r4: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 32%.
dragonsbane.r5: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 36%.

halberd.name: Halberd
halberd.r1: Normal Attacks deal an additional 160% DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

kunwusirisrift.name: Kunwu's Iris Rift
kunwusirisrift.r1: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 10%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 24%.
kunwusirisrift.r2: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 12%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 30%.
kunwusirisrift.r3: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 14%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 36%.
kunwusirisrift.r4: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 16%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 42%.
kunwusirisrift.r5: Increases Normal Attack SPD by 18%. Increases DMG against enemies affected by any element by 48%.

lithicspear.name: Lithic Spear
lithicspear.r1: Normal Attack hits have a 20% chance of causing the next Charged Attack performed in the following 10s to deal 40% increased DMG.

primordialjadewingedspear.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
primordialjadewingedspear.r1: On hit, increases ATK by 3.2% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, increases Skill DMG by 12%.

prototypegrudge.name: Prototype Grudge
prototypegrudge.r1: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 12% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
prototypegrudge.r2: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 15% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
prototypegrudge.r3: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 18% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
prototypegrudge.r4: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 21% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
prototypegrudge.r5: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 24% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

blackcliffslasher.name: Blackcliff Slasher
blackcliffslasher.r1: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffslasher.r2: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 15% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffslasher.r3: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 18% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffslasher.r4: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 21% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
blackcliffslasher.r5: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

bloodtaintedgreatsword.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
bloodtaintedgreatsword.r1: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 12%.
bloodtaintedgreatsword.r2: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 15%.
bloodtaintedgreatsword.r3: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 18%.
bloodtaintedgreatsword.r4: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 21%.
bloodtaintedgreatsword.r5: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 24%.

debateclub.name: Debate Club
debateclub.r1: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 60% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.
debateclub.r5: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 120% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

favoniusgreatsword.name: Favonius Greatsword
favoniusgreatsword.r1: CRIT hits have a 60% chance to generate 1 Elemental Particle. Can only occur once every 12s.
favoniusgreatsword.r2: CRIT hits have a 70% chance to generate 1 Elemental Particle. Can only occur once every 10.5s.
favoniusgreatsword.r3: CRIT hits have an 80% chance to generate 1 Elemental Particle. Can only occur once every 9s.
favoniusgreatsword.r4: CRIT hits have a 90% chance to generate 1 Elemental Particle. Can only occur once every 7.5s.
favoniusgreatsword.r5: CRIT hits have a 100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Particle. Can only occur once every 6s.

ferrousshadow.name: Ferrous Shadow
ferrousshadow.r1: When HP falls below 70%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 30%, and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.
ferrousshadow.r2: When HP falls below 75%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.
ferrousshadow.r3: When HP falls below 80%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 40% and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.
ferrousshadow.r4: When HP falls below 85%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 45% and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.
ferrousshadow.r5: When HP falls below 90%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50% and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.

lithicblade.name: Lithic Blade
lithicblade.r1: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 6% ATK increase and 2% CRIT Rate increase.
lithicblade.r2: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 7% ATK increase and 3% CRIT Rate increase.
lithicblade.r3: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 8% ATK increase and 4% CRIT Rate increase.
lithicblade.r4: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 9% ATK increase and 6% CRIT Rate increase.
lithicblade.r5: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 10% ATK increase and 6% CRIT Rate increase.

prototypeaminus.name: Prototype Aminus
prototypeaminus.r1: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 320% ATK DMG to enemies within a small radius. Can only occur once every 15s.
prototypeaminus.r2: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 390% ATK DMG to enemies within a small radius. Can only occur once every 15s.
prototypeaminus.r3: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 460% ATK DMG to enemies within a small radius. Can only occur once every 15s.
prototypeaminus.r4: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 530% ATK DMG to enemies within a small radius. Can only occur once every 15s.
prototypeaminus.r5: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 600% ATK DMG to enemies within a small radius. Can only occur once every 15s.

quartz.name: Quartz
quartz.r1: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 20% for 12s.
quartz.r2: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 25% for 12s.
quartz.r3: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 30% for 12s.
quartz.r4: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 35% for 12s.
quartz.r5: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 40% for 12s.

raincutter.name: Raincutter
raincutter.r1: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 20%.
raincutter.r2: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 25%.
raincutter.r3: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 30%
raincutter.r4: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 35%.
raincutter.r5: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 40%.

royalgreatsword.name: Royal Greatsword
royalgreatsword.r1: On hit, Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and Base DEF by 28% for 10s. Can only occur once every 20s.
royalgreatsword.r2: On hit, Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and Base DEF by 36% for 10s. Can only occur once every 20s.
royalgreatsword.r3: On hit, Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and Base DEF by 44% for 10s. Can only occur once every 20s.
royalgreatsword.r4: On hit, Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and Base DEF by 52% for 10s. Can only occur once every 20s.
royalgreatsword.r5: On hit, Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and Base DEF by 60% for 10s. Can only occur once every 20s.

serpentspine.name: Serpent Spine
serpentspine.r1: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 5% more DMG and take 4% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be cleared when the character takes DMG.

skyridergreatsword.name: Skyrider Greatsword
skyridergreatsword.r1: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
skyridergreatsword.r2: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 7% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
skyridergreatsword.r3: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
skyridergreatsword.r4: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 9% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
skyridergreatsword.r5: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 10% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.

skywardpride.name: Skyward Pride
skywardpride.r1: Increases all DMG by 8%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 80% Physical DMG to enemies along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.
skywardpride.r2: Increases all DMG by 10%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 100% Physical DMG to enemies along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.
skywardpride.r3: Increases all DMG by 12%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 120% Physical DMG to enemies along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.
skywardpride.r4: Increases all DMG by 14%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 140% Physical DMG to enemies along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.
skywardpride.r5: Increases all DMG by 16%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 160% Physical DMG to enemies along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

thebell.name: The Bell
thebell.r1: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.
thebell.r2: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 50% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 26s.
thebell.r3: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 60% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 22s.
thebell.r4: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 70% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 18s.
thebell.r5: After dealing damage to an enemy with an elemental Skill, the skill has an 80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 14s.

whiteblind.name: Whiteblind
whiteblind.r1: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
whiteblind.r2: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 7.5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
whiteblind.r3: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 9% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
whiteblind.r4: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 10.5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
whiteblind.r5: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 12% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.

wolfsgravestone.name: Wolf's Gravestone
wolfsgravestone.r1: Increases Base ATK by 20%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 40% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
wolfsgravestone.r2: Increases Base ATK by 25%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 50% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
wolfsgravestone.r3: Increases Base ATK by 30%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 60% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
wolfsgravestone.r4: Increases Base ATK by 35%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 70% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
wolfsgravestone.r5: Increases Base ATK by 40%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 80% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

ambercatalyst.name: Amber Catalyst
ambercatalyst.r1: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.
ambercatalyst.r2: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 7.5% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.
ambercatalyst.r3: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 9% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.
ambercatalyst.r4: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 10.5% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.
ambercatalyst.r5: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.

blackcliffamulet.name: Blackcliff Amulet
blackcliffamulet.r1: Defeating an enemy increases the next Elemental Burst's DMG by 24%. Lasts for 3s. Max 3 stacks.
blackcliffamulet.r2: Defeating an enemy increases the next Elemental Burst's DMG by 30%. Lasts for 3s. Max 3 stacks.
blackcliffamulet.r3: Defeating an enemy increases the next Elemental Burst's DMG by 36%. Lasts for 3s. Max 3 stacks.
blackcliffamulet.r4: Defeating an enemy increases the next Elemental Burst's DMG by 42%. Lasts for 3s. Max 3 stacks.
blackcliffamulet.r5: Defeating an enemy increases the next Elemental Burst's DMG by 48%. Lasts for 3s. Max 3 stacks.

eyeofperception.name: Eye of Perception
eyeofperception.r1: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 240% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between enemies a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 12s.
eyeofperception.r2: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 270% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between enemies a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 11s.
eyeofperception.r3: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 300% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between enemies a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 10s.
eyeofperception.r4: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 330% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between enemies a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 9s.
eyeofperception.r5: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 360% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between enemies a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 8s.

favoniuscodex.name: Favonius Codex
favoniuscodex.r1: CRIT hits have a 60% chance to generate 1 Elemental Particle. Can only occur once every 12s.
favoniuscodex.r2: CRIT hits have a 70% chance to generate 1 Elemental Particle. Can only occur once every 10.5s.
favoniuscodex.r3: CRIT hits have an 80% chance to generate 1 Elemental Particle. Can only occur once every 9s.
favoniuscodex.r4: CRIT hits have a 90% chance to generate 1 Elemental Particle. Can only occur once every 7.5s.
favoniuscodex.r5: CRIT hits have a 100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Particle. Can only occur once every 6s.

jadeorb.name: Jade Orb
jadeorb.r1: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 20% for 12s.
jadeorb.r2: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 25% for 12s.
jadeorb.r3: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 30% for 12s.
jadeorb.r4: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 35% for 12s.
jadeorb.r5: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 40% for 12s.

lostprayertothesacredwinds.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
lostprayertothesacredwinds.r1: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, earn a 6% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
lostprayertothesacredwinds.r2: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, earn an 8% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
lostprayertothesacredwinds.r3: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, earn a 10% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
lostprayertothesacredwinds.r4: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, earn a 12% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
lostprayertothesacredwinds.r5: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, earn a 14% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

magicguide.name: Magic Guide
magicguide.r1: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 12%.
magicguide.r2: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 15%.
magicguide.r3: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 18%.
magicguide.r4: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 21%.
magicguide.r5: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 24%.

mappamare.name: Mappa Mare
mappamare.r1: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 10% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

otherworldlystory.name: Otherworldly Story
otherworldlystory.r1: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1% HP.

prototypemalice.name: Prototype Malice
prototypemalice.r1: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4 Energy every 2s for 6s. Additionally, all party members will regenerate 4% HP every 2s for this duration.

royalgrimoire.name: Royal Grimoire
royalgrimoire.r1: Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to fire an Energy Blast at enemies, which deals 240% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
royalgrimoire.r2: Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to fire an Energy Blast at enemies, which deals 300% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
royalgrimoire.r3: Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to fire an Energy Blast at enemies, which deals 360% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
royalgrimoire.r4: Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to fire an Energy Blast at enemies, which deals 420% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
royalgrimoire.r5: Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to fire an Energy Blast at enemies, which deals 480% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

sacrificialfragments.name: Sacrificial Fragments
sacrificialfragments.r1: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.
sacrificialfragments.r2: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 50% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 25s.
sacrificialfragments.r3: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 60% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 20s.
sacrificialfragments.r4: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 70% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 15s.
sacrificialfragments.r5: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has an 80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 10s.

skywardatlas.name: Skyward Atlas
skywardatlas.r1: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 12%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing 160% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.
skywardatlas.r2: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 15%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing 200% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.
skywardatlas.r3: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 18%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing 240% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.
skywardatlas.r4: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 21%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing 280% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.
skywardatlas.r5: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 24%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing 320% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

solarpearl.name: Solar Pearl
solarpearl.r1: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 20% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 20% for 6s.
solarpearl.r2: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 25% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 25% for 6s.
solarpearl.r3: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 30% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 39% for 6s.
solarpearl.r4: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 35% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 35% for 6s.
solarpearl.r5: Normal Attacks hits increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 40% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increases Normal Attack DMG by 40% for 6s.

thewidsith.name: The Widsith
thewidsith.r1: When a character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s: Recitative: Increases Base ATK by 60% Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240 Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48%Can only occur once every 30s.
thewidsith.r2: When a character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s: Recitative: Increases Base ATK by 75% Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 300 Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 60% Can only occur once every 30s
thewidsith.r3: When switching to the wielder, a randomly selected theme tune plays for 10s: Recitative: Increases Base ATK by 90% Interlude: Increases CRIT Rate by 90% Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 90% Can only occur once every 45s.
thewidsith.r4: When switching to the wielder, a randomly selected theme tune plays for 10s: Recitative: Increases Base ATK by 105% Interlude: Increases CRIT Rate by 105% Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 105% Can only occur once every 45s.
thewidsith.r5: When switching to the wielder, a randomly selected theme tune plays for 10s: Recitative: Increases Base ATK by 120% Interlude: Increases CRIT Rate by 120% Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 120% Can only occur once every 45s.

thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.r1: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 24% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.
thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.r2: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 30% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.
thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.r3: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 36% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.
thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.r4: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 42% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.
thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.r5: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 48% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

twinnephrite.name: Twin Nephrite
twinnephrite.r1: Defeating an enemy increases Movement SPD and ATK by 12% for 15s.
twinnephrite.r2: Defeating an enemy increases Movement SPD and ATK by 14% for 15s.
twinnephrite.r3: Defeating an enemy increases Movement SPD and ATK by 16% for 15s.
twinnephrite.r4: Defeating an enemy increases Movement SPD and ATK by 18% for 15s.
twinnephrite.r5: Defeating an enemy increases Movement SPD and ATK by 20% for 15s.

wineandsong.name: Wine and Song
wineandsong.r1: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 8% ATK increase and 3% Movement SPD increase.
wineandsong.r2: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 10% ATK increase and 3.5% Movement SPD increase.
wineandsong.r3: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 12% ATK increase and 4% Movement SPD increase.
wineandsong.r4: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 14% ATK increase and 4.5% Movement SPD increase.
wineandsong.r5: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 16% ATK increase and 5% Movement SPD increase.
